title: How to Make a Mocha Cookie Crumble Frappuccino

steps.headline: Add the 1 cup of ice to a blender or cup.
Add 2 shots of espresso coffee or just any regular coffee.
Put in 3 pumps of dark or regular chocolate syrup.
Finish with 3 teaspoons of chocolate chips.
Blend all the ingredients together.
steps.description: You might need to scrape out some of it with a spoon.

steps.headline: Top it off with chocolate whipped cream and Oreo cookie crumbles.

text: Add the 1 cup of ice to a blender or cup.  Add 1/2 a cup of milk.  Add 2 shots of espresso coffee or just any regular coffee.  Put in 3 pumps of dark or regular chocolate syrup.  Squirt 3 pumps of vanilla syrup.  Finish with 3 teaspoons of chocolate chips.  Blend all the ingredients together. You might need to scrape out some of it with a spoon. Top it off with chocolate whipped cream and Oreo cookie crumbles. Enjoy!
